The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application

C:\\Users\\jehca\\OneDrive\\Desktop\\meu.serviceRawFile:
service: amazon-scraper

provider:
  name: aws
  runtime: nodejs16.x
  stage: dev
  region: us-east-1

functions:
  getProdutos:
    handler: src/handler.get
    events:
      - http:
          path: produtos
          method: get
          cors: true
  
  postProdutos:
    handler: src/handler.post
    events:
      - http:
          path: produtos
          method: post
          cors: true

resources:
  Resources:
    ProdutosTable:
      Type: AWS::DynamoDB::Table
      Properties:
        TableName: Produtos
        AttributeDefinitions:
          - AttributeName: id
            AttributeType: S
        KeySchema:
          - AttributeName: id
            KeyType: HASH
        ProvisionedThroughput:
          ReadCapacityUnits: 1
          WriteCapacityUnits: 1
